name: vscode-sass-format
description: Beautify sass, scss and css files.
author: Sasa Jovanovic

sassFormat.indent.description: How many spaces to use for each level of indentation. Defaults to 4. "t" means use hard tabs.

sassFormat.oldStyle.description: Output the old-style ":prop val" property syntax. Only meaningful when formating Sass.

sassFormat.defaultEncoding.description: Specify the default encoding for input files. Defaults to "UTF-8".

sassFormat.unixNewlines.description: Use Unix-style newlines in written files. Always true on Unix. This setting is deprecated. Please use "End of Line" setting from VS Code.

sassFormat.useSingleQuotes.description: Use single quotes. Double quotes in comments will remain untouched.

sassFormat.inlineComments.description: Keep inline comments inline. Experimental support.

sassFormat.numberLeadingZero.description: Keep leading zero in numbers. Experimental support.

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
